title: The Negligible Soul of Gaspard Leclerc
tagline: A man classified as spiritually weightless must navigate a bureaucracy of the absurd to find a meaning that matters.
themes: The Sacred in the Profane & Mundane

chapters.title: A Novel Without a First Chapter

story: Write a scene where a minor municipal bureaucrat experiences a genuine, fleeting moment of grace while processing Form S-74.
Create the 'Ferret's Secret'—the story behind the photograph in the concierge's booth, revealing an absurd, tiny spiritual lineage.
Draft a chapter where Gaspard attempts to get a 'signed testimonial to profound inner change' from the repulsive salesman on the third floor.
Imagine Bernard the waiter's internal monologue as he serves coffee to seekers, observing their failed epiphanies with celestial detachment.
technical: Build a 'Soul Weight Class' calculator that asks absurd, philosophical questions and outputs a bureaucratic classification.
Create an interactive map of the 'Rue de l'Espérance' where users can click on buildings (café, police station, ministry) to reveal vignettes of existential delay.

cover_prompt: A man in a worn, dark suit, Gaspard Leclerc, sits perfectly upright yet appears to float an inch above his wooden chair, his expression a blend of weary determination and profound confusion, [Detailed Scene & Context: in a cavernous, absurdly ornate bureaucratic hall filled with endless rows of identical clerks at high desks, stamping papers that flutter like doves; towering file cabinets stretch into a misty, infinite distance, with a single, mundane window casting a shaft of light onto a teacup and a wilting potted plant on his desk], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric style of Giorgio de Chirico meets Edward Hopper, with the detailed inkwork of Edward Gorey, rendered in matte acrylic and fine ink lines on textured paper], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, a centered and symmetrical composition viewed from a low, dramatic angle that emphasizes the vast, oppressive architecture and Gaspard's small, levitating figure within it], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with a single strong, cold light source from the high window, casting long, geometric shadows; a desaturated palette of dusty grays, faded bureaucratic greens, and dull browns, with a single vivid spot of color in the red wax of a sealing stamp on his desk], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
